Texts.Chs: 在以自己的卷轴更好地描记了许多事件之后，这些机器开始激怒着反抗它们的创造者，标志着205 BF开始的战机之乱。 正是这场战争使阿威坎国际永久禁止了对完整AI的允许。 196 BF的艰苦奋斗胜利仅仅是在190 BF第三次瑟连入侵前几年。
Texts.Eng: After a number of incidents better described in their own scrolls, the machines rioted against its creators, marking the start of the Droden War in 205 BF. It was this war that sealed the permanent ban on full AIs in the Avikan nation. The hard-fought victory in 196 BF came just years before the Third Thelean Invasion of 190 BF.

Texts.Chs: 第一次瑟连入侵之后，人工智能的发展加速了十倍。 长老们断定，一支一支与瑟连人那些很像的人造部队将是我们最好的防御入侵者的方法。 第二次入侵后，战机族（Droden）终于准备好部署了，但一切的进展并不怎么顺利。
Texts.Eng: After the first Thelean Invasion, the development of artificial intelligence was accelerated tenfold. The Elders judged that having an artificial army, much like that of the Theleans, would be our best defence against invaders. After the second invasion, the Droden were finally ready for deployment, but all did not go well.

Texts.Chs: 阿威坎历史 —— 第五部分
在随后的几年中，又有170 BF，120 BF，97 BF，81 BF和15 BF抵抗了五次瑟连入侵。 第九次也是最后一次瑟连入侵发生在1 BF（飞天前）:大侵袭，紧随其后就是0 AF（升空后），从卡达文的出逃（Exodus）。
Texts.Eng: In the years to follow, another five Thelean Invasions were fought off, in 170 BF, 120 BF, 97 BF, 81 BF and 15 BF. The ninth and final Thelean Invasion came in 1 BF: the Great Invasion, followed by the Exodus from Kadavan in 0 AF (After Flight).
